snippet: Lawyers for the husband of Marlise Muñoz, a pregnant woman said to have been brain-dead since November, have sued the Texas hospital that is keeping her on life support.
abstract: Lawyers for husband of Marlise Munoz, pregnant woman said to have been brain-dead since November, sue John Peter Smith Hospital in Texas, which is keeping her on life support; doctors cited obscure state law that prevents them from withdrawing or withholding life-sustaining treatment from pregnant patients; law is symbolic of state's anti-abortion culture.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for the husband of Marlise Muñoz, a pregnant woman said to have been brain-dead since November, have sued the Texas hospital that is keeping her on life support.

headline.main: Suing to End Life Support for Woman and Fetus
headline.print_headline: Suing to End Life Support For Woman And Fetus

keywords.value: John Peter Smith Hospital (Fort Worth, Tex)
keywords.name: organizations
